contentBlocks.title: Design Blocks
contentBlocks.description: A selection of 45 page sections that fit perfectly in any combination

howitworks.title: You design it
howitworks.description: From buttons, to inputs, navbars, alerts or cards, you are covered

howitworks.title: We print it
howitworks.description: Mix the sections, change the colors and unleash your creativity

howitworks.title: You receive it
howitworks.description: Save 3-4 weeks of work when you use our pre-made pages for your website

testimonial1.brief: We have many happy customers all over Europe that just keep on relying on our service

testimonial2.review1: Thanks to Cheesy Layers, my jewelry designs come to life flawlessly. The quick quotes and precision make them my go-to 3D printing partner.
testimonial2.review2: For my engineering projects, Cheesy Layers is a lifesaver. Quick, detailed, and affordable, I highly recommend them.
testimonial2.review3: Running a small business, I need quality without breaking the bank. Cheesy Layers lets me expand my range and keeps customers coming back.

partner.head1: Would you like to work with us?
partner.subhead: We are partnering with small brands and local printing shops as a reliable 3d printing manufacturer

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: At Fat Layers, we're passionate about 3D printing and precision. We've simplified the process of turning ideas into reality, serving both individuals and businesses with exceptional quality. Join us as we lead the way in crafting the future, one layer at a time.

aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.description: I am a passionate web developer who loves creating beautiful and functional websites. With years of experience in the field, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality web solutions to clients worldwide.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: For further questions, including partnership opportunities, please email hello@creative-tim.com or contact using our contact form.
contactUs.label: How can we help?
contactUs.messagePlaceholder: Describe your problem in at least 250 characters
